uid.description: Unique identifier for the plan package.

name.description: Internal name of the plan package.

display_name.description: Display name of the plan package shown to users.

quotas.description: Quotas and limits for the plan package.

settings.description: Settings and configurations for the plan package.

disable_add_staff_button.description: Whether the add staff button is disabled.

disable_sms_purchase_button.description: Whether the SMS purchase button is disabled.

free.description: Indicates if this is a free plan package.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the plan package was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the plan package was last updated.

features.description: List of features included in the plan package.

description.description: Description of what the feature provides.

features.name: basic_business_features
features.description: Privilege to turn on reminder in cliche, email signature in vCita, Allow business to mark message as read/unread

features.name: scheduling_features
features.description: SMS booking confirmation, scheduling notice, auto follow up hours, meeting auto response, charge type, reminders, client card fields no multiline. if this feature is not on there is only in test quota for online scheduling

features.name: invoicing_features
features.description: Allow invoicing for an account (payments module sub feature)
